title: Primetime Draven bug
body: Primetime draven is currently using the pool party draven auto attacks (the squishy splashy noise) and its slightly annoying :(

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! It looks like this is a known issue on our end. Lemme follow up with one of our audio engineers to get a pulse on the bug.
omg im dying i got a rito response <3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=jT1OeW3R,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-01T22:11:32.199+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! It looks like this is a known issue on our end. Lemme follow up with one of our audio engineers to get a pulse on the bug.

why have we had no clarity on the draven Q Axe path being wrong when we move in said direction(I go backwards it goes forward,etc) also clarity on the axes Q disappearing? I found this topic, and it's a year old.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/x8ZpOPsg-draven-q-bug-riot
So, that's why I was hating that skin, that damn sound was bothering me all the time while using the skin..
